text_block_list.text: Some time into the preparation camp ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— A'ight, let's take it from the top 
'n go over where we at right now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
So tell me… Oguri! How many major parts're 
the Relay rituals split into? Go on!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Mm? Let me see…… The Threading has four parts and the Dash has only one… I think.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Tha'sit! Glad ya ain't being a comedian this time. 
Right, let's go over the Threading then～

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
First off, there's this offering of an ～austere～ dance in front'a 
the ritual fire, then we transfer the flames to torches.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Second part's got us Sacred Equines running 
up the mountain with those torches, hauling 
'em flames to the Precinct up top.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
So then when us Sacred Equines hit the Precinct, 
we s'posed to do a fierce dance with the torches, 
yelling our heads off while circling 'round ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
We're putting our everything into all that, one after 
t'other, so well, 's gonna be real intense!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— Tha's why today we'll be practicing that second part, 
starting with the bit where we run 'round the Precinct!

text_block_list.name: Inari & Tamamo
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… Tama and Inari really are amazing. I don't know 
how they can shout so loud while running.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
'Tis impressive how those two can still flawlessly deliver 
such a fierce dance despite that. Their athleticism and 
stamina knows no bounds……!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Pfeeh! I'm runnin' ragged here, but the freedom to go a li'l wild 'n not worry about details as much makes this whole heaps nicer than that starting dance～

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha! Ya sure know how to let loose, don'tcha, Tama! Still got yerself some catchin' up to do though!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Who'm I in need of catching up to, missy? Bring it on! I'ma light up the next group practice!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…… I have a lot to learn from your vigorous expressions. 
Being the farthest behind in this area, I must concentrate 
my efforts ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well, ain't anyone thinking of loud yelling when they see 
you, do they. Got heaps better at it than before if y'ask 
me though, you doin' well!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But hey, I imagined you'd be great at this too, Yaeno… 
Something off with ya? 'Spect you can get a li'l 
more energy out, nah?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I…… I'm very sorry. I will make every effort 
to catch up to you two.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Ah well, Yaeno's grand in that majestic first dance meanwhilst! 
We'll be countin' on 'er pulling us along there!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… I will do my very best.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— A'ight, let's get crackin' on the third part. 
This one's a huge change a' pace again.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Once we done cavorting 'round the Precinct, our job's to 
transfer the torchs' flames to the brazier set up at the altar 
in the center 'n swap with the next Sacred Equine.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: So then we've this Verse of Solace thing. One of us gotta read an emotional scripture offering praise 'n solace for ancient horsegirls' wishes.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"My well-wishes be"…… "each of you"…… 
"pursuit of novel frontiers"…… Uhh……

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
"Those who tread-upon a path… veiled to all"…… 
"eras by gone to the now now to the here after"……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
"Countless souls who tread before, thy threads twine'd 
here illuminate, become our faith, our solace, thy memories 
burn on, alighting our guiding flame." ——

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
…… Well I can't right say anything about y'all on this. 
All that complicated kanji and prose be hurtin' my head already!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I am most in awe of how Ardan has already memorized 
the passages. Not to mention how truly beautifully she 
manages to recite them.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— S-Shoot! Oguri 'boutta start steaming again! 
Best hold a moment, Ardan!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… I-I'm sorry. Even though Ardan went through the trouble 
of providing the meanings and readings for me……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
No worries. Your pronunciations have steadily improved, Oguri. 
We can take it one step at a time. I will help you through it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thank you… You're like a kind teacher, Ardan……

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
One thing's f'sure, I'm glad Ardan's part of our li'l group. 
We'da been stumped weren't it for that……

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— So we got the Threading's fourth part 'n the 
next ritual — the Dash — left for practice.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
After reading the Verse of Solace, us Sacred Equines, 
we chuck flowers of blessings from the altar to spread 
good luck 'n happiness.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
This fourth part's the end of the Threading of Memories. 
We do got the Dash of Remembrance ritual after, but ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: That one's only got one part. Peace a' cake!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: —— Uffh, haah… I think I like this "Dash of Remembrance". All we have to do is run from the Precinct down to the foot of the mountain. It's fun, almost like a race.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
—— Gahh, we're just here to check on the course, what're ya 
gone runnin' all out for! Got me all fired up too over here, 
wouldn't ya know, ya donkey!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I must concur. 'Tis barely different from training practice. 
… Though I will admit it is very much like Oguri.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
… It doesn't seem like we will face any issues with the Dash 
of Remembrance at least. On the contrary, I believe everyone 
is feeling more excited about it than any of the other rituals.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
No kiddin'. What's it about running with Oguri that's got folks 
feeling like this, some mysterious charm or whatnot?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But looking at it, our issue's bound'a be the Threading. 
Got a mountain to climb for each part on that one.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
'T won't be long to the day of the presentation. 
… Quite how much can we improve by then, I wonder?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… I'm sorry for sucking at everything. I might end up 
holding everyone back like this ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
A'ight, can it! I know y'anxious. Got heaps I ain't 
dealing so well with either, 'n our practice's limited. 
Sure, yeah, but y'know ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
We a team now. Ain't gotta go it alone. We all got our strengths 
'n can cover each other's flaws. Let's get stuck in!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: You tell us, Boss! Wrapped that up real nice didn'cha! Class!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
It is as Tamamo says. We must stand together, and give 
our utmost to fulfill our duties as Sacred Equines…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Tha's it, yeah! We gotta stand together… Stand together? 
Stand together… like in a circle………?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
…… Say, an idea jus' hit me! 
Listen up, friends ——
